title: eSports Australia - Facebook news, events and results page.
body:
Hey guys,
A group of uni students have been managing a facebook paged based around keeping other Australian's up to date with the eSports scene locally. Any news you may find relevant or results you may know of, Don't be afraid to send us a message. We are a community based project looking to share our passion of eSports.

Regards,
Tilt
